PROCESSTYPE.name: Oauth flow
PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML:
<definitions targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL">
  <message name="injectListJSON" id="injectListJSON"/>
  <process isExecutable="true" name="Oauth flow" id="Oauth_flow">
    <startEvent name="Oauth flow" id="start"/>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_Choose_form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" name="Choose Form" id="choose_form"/>
    <endEvent name="end" id="end"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="choose_form" sourceRef="start" id="flow5"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="exclusivegateway1" sourceRef="choose_form" id="flow6"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="Twitter" id="servicetask1">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_TwitterFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${TwitterREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="end" sourceRef="usertask1" id="flow7"/>
    <exclusiveGateway name="Exclusive Gateway" id="exclusivegateway1"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask1" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="Twitter Oauth 1.0a" id="flow8">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "Twitter"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="Dropbox" id="servicetask2">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_DropboxFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${DropboxREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask2" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="Dropbox Oauth 2.0" id="flow9">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "Dropbox"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_oauth1a_form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" name="Oauth 1a Form" id="usertask1"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="usertask1" sourceRef="servicetask1" id="flow10"/>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_oauth2_form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" name="Oauth 2 Form" id="usertask2"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="usertask2" sourceRef="servicetask2" id="flow11"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="end" sourceRef="usertask2" id="flow12"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="GoogleDrive" id="servicetask3">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_GoogleFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${GoogleREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="Box" id="servicetask4">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_BoxFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${BoxREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask3" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="GoogleDrive Oauth 2.0" id="flow14">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "GoogleDrive"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask4" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="Box Oauth 2.0" id="flow15">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "Box"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="usertask4" sourceRef="servicetask3" id="flow16"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="usertask4" sourceRef="servicetask4" id="flow17"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="usertask3" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="Docusign Oauth 2.0" id="flow18">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "Docusign"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_Docusign_OAuth_Save" name="Docusign Plugin" id="servicetask6">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="username">
          <activiti:expression>${username}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="password">
          <activiti:expression>${password}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="end" sourceRef="servicetask6" id="flow20"/>
    <userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee} " name="Docusign" id="usertask3">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:formProperty required="true" type="string" name="USERNAME" id="username"/>
        <activiti:formProperty required="true" type="string" name="PASSWORD" id="password"/>
      </extensionElements>
    </userTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask6" sourceRef="usertask3" id="flow21"/>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_oauth2_refreshToken_form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" name="Oauth 2 refresh token Form" id="usertask4"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="end" sourceRef="usertask4" id="flow22"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="SalesForce" id="servicetask7">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_SalesForceFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${SalesForceREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask7" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="SalesForce Oauth 2.0" id="flow23">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "SalesForce"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="Hubspot" id="servicetask8">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_HubspotFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${HubspotREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_oauth2_hubspot_refreshToken_form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" name="Oauth 2 hubspot refresh token Form" id="usertask5"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask8" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="Hubspot Oauth 2.0" id="flow25">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "Hubspot"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="usertask5" sourceRef="servicetask8" id="flow26"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="end" sourceRef="usertask5" id="flow27"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="Intuit" id="servicetask9">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_IntuitFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${IntuitREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="usertask4" sourceRef="servicetask7" id="flow29"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask9" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="Intuit Oauth 1.0a" id="flow30">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apiServiceName == "Intuit"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="usertask1" sourceRef="servicetask9" id="flow31"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="GoogleCalendar" id="servicetask10">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
          <activiti:string>poi_GoogleCalendarFactRead_fact</activiti:string>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
          <activiti:expression>${GoogleCalendarREADMap}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask10" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="GoogleCalendar Oauth 2.0" id="flow32"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="usertask4" sourceRef="servicetask10" id="flow33"/>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_Oauth_flow">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_Oauth_flow" bpmnElement="Oauth_flow">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_start" bpmnElement="start">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="160.0" x="20.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_choose_form" bpmnElement="choose_form">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="148.0" x="225.0" width="100.0" height="60.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_end" bpmnElement="end">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="160.0" x="890.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_servicetask1" bpmnElement="servicetask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="70.0" x="450.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway1" bpmnElement="exclusivegateway1">

forms.name: Choose API service and Oauth type

origin.name: Choose API service and Oauth type
